name: The Three Stooges: Digitally Remastered Edition
overview: The Three Stooges: Digitally Remastered Edition is a "Remastered" version of the classic Cinemaware game The Three Stooges with new graphics and sound, while retaining the original gameplay. In The Three Stooges, you play the three dudes Moe, Curly and Larry who want to save an old woman's orphanage from the evil banker who wants to take it away. They need to get $5000 in the next 30 days or the orphanage is gone. To achieve that aim, they can do diverse activities - like prizefighting, participating in a radio quiz, serving pies or eating oysters.
